data.title: Brown, Giddings and Silver Bell roads
data.meta_description: In 2024, Brown, Giddings and Silver Bell roads will be reconstructed from Jamm Road to M-24 (Lapeer Road) in Auburn Hills and Orion Township communities. The approximate $15 million project is funded with state and federal dollars.
data.text:
PUBLIC MEETING:

The Road Commission for Oakland County (RCOC), in partnership with Orion Township and Auburn Hills, held a public meeting for 2024 planned construction on Brown, Giddings and Silver Bell roads from Jamm Road to M-24 (Lapeer Road) on Thursday, September 21, 2023. The meeting was from 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. at Orion Township Hall's Dragon Community Room, 2323 Joslyn Road, Orion Township.

Project meeting and information flyer
